title: Wives of the Rich And Famous
overview: They're rich, They're nasty. And they're famous for doing things that should be kept secret. These are poor little rich chicks with more than enough money and all the time in the world to try any kind of kinky, erotic action their little oversexed bodies want. So while the old man's out there getting richer... they're upstairs getting hornier. Let's join 'em!
